ShaderParamDef
struct
ShaderParamDef
ShaderParamInstance

ShaderParamDef defines the shader definitions that were parsed from HLSL by ParseShader. These definitions define the variables that each shader defines (i.e. may be set by the client)

Parameters
m_type

Defines type of this parameter

m_name

Name of shader parameter

m_offset

Register offset

m_members

Number of elements (i.e. some parameters can be arrays)

m_elemSize

sizeof a single element in bytes (used by buffers)

Module

import Rendering.Caustic.Shader;

ShaderParamInstance
public
ShaderParamDef
struct
ShaderParamInstance

ShaderParamInstance defines each parameter that a shader exposes. These parameters are derived from the ShaderParamDefs above. This is servers copy of each parameter along with its value and position in the constant buffer.

Parameters
m_value

Value assigned to this parameter

m_values

Array of values assigned to this parameter

m_dirty

Is parameter dirty and needs to be pushed to constant buffer

Module

import Rendering.Caustic.Shader;

SBuffer
struct
SBuffer

Defines a buffer (which may be either a constant buffer or and unordered access buffer used by a compute shader).

Members
m_spBuffer

the D3D buffer (that will be passed to the compute shader)

m_spStagingBuffer

staging buffer for going between CPU and GPU

m_spView

A view onto the buffer m_spBuffer

m_bufferSize

size of buffer in bytes

m_heapSize

size of the total heap the buffer is contained in

Module

import Rendering.Caustic.Shader;

CGPUBuffer
public
IGPUBuffer
public
CRefCount
CGPUBuffer

Defines a buffer that is created by the client for passing/receiving data from a compute shader.

Module

import Rendering.Caustic.Shader;

CShader
public
IShader
public
CRefCount
CShader

Defines a shader used to render materials on an object

A shader defines a material on a renderable. It is comprised of a pixel shader, a vertex shader, and constants passed to those shaders.

Module

import Rendering.Caustic.Shader;
